data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Sakon Nakhon, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sakon Nakhon, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Sakon Nakhon, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 154 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Sakon Nakhon.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Sakon Nakhon, Thailand the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Aheu Luang people.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,201,900 people living in Sakon Nakhon, Thailand. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 7,772 believers in the state of Sakon Nakhon to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Sakon Nakhon, Thailand.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

location.name: Sakon Nakhon
